props.name: singleSelect
props.desc: True to allow selection of only one row at a time (defaults to false)

events.name: afterselectionchange
events.desc: Fires after the selection changes (eg. by key press or clicking)

events.name: beforerowselect
events.desc: Fires when a row is selected being selected, return false to cancel.

events.name: rowdeselect
events.desc: Fires when a row is deselected.

events.name: rowselect
events.desc: Fires when a row is selected.
